title: Apollo mathematicus, or, The art of curing diseases by the mathematicks according to the principles of Dr. Pitcairn : a work both profitable and pleasant, and never published in English before : to which is subjoined, A discourse of certainty, according to the principles of the same author.
author: Eizat, Edward, Sir.
notes: A satire on works by Archibald Pitcairn.
"A discourse of certainty" ([2], 26 p.) has special t.p.
Written by Edward Gizat. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
